Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Amazing \A*maz"ing\, a. Causing amazement; very wonderful; as, amazing grace. -- {A*maz"ing*ly}, adv. [1913 Webster]
amazingly adv : in an amazing manner; to everyone's surprise; "amazingly, he finished medical school in three years" [syn: {surprisingly}, {astonishingly}]
